about.registerNow: Sign up now and experience the magic of Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf!
about.descriptionText: At Sponk Keramik you can create many creative works with different building techniques, work on the potter's wheel or try your glazing skills on a finished blank. Whether you are a beginner or already experienced, come by and enjoy the nice atmosphere where you will be completely relaxed.
about.giftIdeas: Many gift ideas for your loved ones, whether for birthdays, Mother's Day or just because.
about.quote: Clay is a wonderful natural product with which anyone can create a unique work.
about.processText1: At the beginning, the clay is properly homogenized by kneading it for at least three minutes, like pizza dough. We make sure that there are no air pockets in the clay, as these explode during the bisque firing (first firing) and may also destroy other works.
about.processText2: The prepared clay can now be shaped using different techniques (pottery, table building). There are no limits to creativity and wonderful works are created every time, which then have to dry at room temperature for at least 5-7 days before they are bisque fired at approx. 900 degrees. Takes a total of approx. 48 hours with the cooling phase before the works can be removed from the kiln again. Now the works are ready to be glazed (painted). Different techniques can be used depending on the desired result to achieve exciting goals. The glaze works in the kiln at over 1000 degrees and therefore has a life of its own, which always surprises us ceramicists. Therefore, there are also important points that must be observed when glazing.
about.processConclusion: Every ceramic fan should be happy when they work with clay and that's what Sponk Keramik & Courses stands for.
about.creativeTitle: Join in ‚Äì Creativity without limits at Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf
about.creativeText1: Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf offers you not only courses and workshops, but also an opportunity to escape from stressful everyday life. Here you can relax, get creative and create handmade artworks that reflect your personality.
about.creativeText2: Whether you choose ceramic painting or pottery ‚Äì we have everything you need to make your vision a reality. Our experienced team is at your side every step of the way and ensures that you have an unforgettable time with us.
about.adultsText: In our special courses for adults, you can let your creativity run free in a relaxed atmosphere. Ideal for unwinding after work or meeting new people with similar interests.
about.familyText: Experience creative hours with your children! Together you can paint beautiful ceramics or work on simple pottery projects. An experience that brings the whole family together.
about.eventsText: Are you planning a special celebration? Whether birthdays, bachelor parties or corporate events ‚Äì at Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf you can design your events creatively. We offer you tailor-made packages for unforgettable experiences.
about.locationSubTitle: Our Location in D√ºsseldorf ‚Äì Easy to Reach
about.locationText1: Our studio is centrally located in D√ºsseldorf and is easy to reach, whether by car or public transport. We invite you to come by, enjoy the relaxed atmosphere and be inspired.
about.faq1Question: How can I book a course at Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf?
about.faq1Answer: It's easy! Visit our website and choose your desired course. You can book directly online or contact us if you have any questions.
about.faq2Answer: No, our courses are suitable for all experience levels ‚Äì from beginners to advanced.
about.faq3Answer: We provide all the materials and tools you need. You can focus entirely on your creative project.
about.readyText1: Now is the perfect time to visit Sponk Keramik & Courses D√ºsseldorf. Book your workshop today and discover the joy of handmade art!
about.readyText2: Here you will find the perfect gift for your loved ones, and with 10 days advance notice you can even choose the colors.
about.groupEventsText: Here people can have a wonderful time by just glazing (painting yourself) a ceramic blank, or creating works themselves. When just glazing blanks, one visit, when creating works, two visits to the studio. Unique pieces produced in the workshop, as well as industrially manufactured ceramic blanks are available. The duration and gastronomic points are discussed in detail. The price depends on the scope, so please clarify when inquiring.
about.birthdaysText: Up to 12 children can experience an unforgettable painting event where they can be very creative. The children have the opportunity to glaze (paint) a milk cup, plate or cereal bowl. In addition, the children are shown around the studio and see the large ceramic kiln, which always leads to enthusiasm. The children have a wonderful keepsake from this special day that they can take home. 33,-‚Ç¨ per child.
about.welcomeSection: Welcome to Sponk Keramik‚Äì Creativity Meets Craftsmanship
about.discoverTitle: Discover the World of Ceramics: Painting, Pottery and Buying!
about.discoverText: Would you like to let your creativity run free? At Sponkkeramik we offer you the opportunity to create unique ceramic artworks yourself or to acquire artistic pieces for your home. Whether beginner or experienced artist ‚Äì with us you will find inspiration and the perfect environment for your ceramic projects.
about.paintingText: Give expression to your imagination! In our workshop you can paint ceramic blanks to your heart's content. Choose from a wide selection of shapes and colors and create your very own personal artwork. Ideal for families, children's birthday parties or relaxing afternoons with friends.
about.potteryText: Have you always wanted to shape your own dishes or decorations from clay? Our pottery courses offer you the opportunity to learn the basics or deepen your skills. With professional guidance and high-quality materials you will quickly achieve amazing results.
about.buyText: Are you looking for handmade unique pieces for your home or as a gift? In our shop you will find lovingly designed ceramics that inspire with their quality and uniqueness. Each creation is an expression of craftsmanship and passion.
